title: Kate Middleton spoke to other moms about how quickly Prince George is growing up while sporting an $885 outfit
text:
Kate Middleton bonded over parenting with other moms at her latest royal engagement.

The Duchess of Cambridge stepped out on a chic polka dot blouse for a visit to a children's health center in London on Thursday.

During the visit, Middleton gushed about her eldest child, Prince George, saying she couldn't believe he was already 6 years old.

Read more: A British radio host says she gave her daughter the initials 'HRH' so that she could date Prince George

"She [Middleton] asked how old [my son] Oliver is and what football shirt he was wearing," one mom told the Mail Online.

"She said children grow up so quickly and she can't believe George is 6 already."

George, who is the eldest of three children, celebrated his sixth birthday in July.

Middleton's daughter, Princess Charlotte, is 4 years old, and had her first day of school this month. Meanwhile, her youngest, Prince Louis, is just over a year old and made his debut public appearance on the Buckingham Palace balcony earlier this summer.

The duchess paired a $140 Equipment blouse with $50 flared trousers from Zara, Yahoo reports.

Middleton spoke about her children during the visit. Ian Vogler/ AFP/ Getty Images

Although Middleton is more likely to be spotted in a designer dress than anything else, flared and high-waisted trousers have slowly started to become a firm favorite for more casual engagements.

Recently, she sported a similar beige pair for the Chelsea Flower Show earlier this summer.

The duchess paired beige trousers with a floral shirt for a visit to her Back to Nature garden at the Chelsea Flower Show. REUTERS

Middleton completed the look on Thursday with her signature blow-out, and a pair of $695 Gianvito Rossi heels.

description: The Duchess of Cambridge said she "can't believe George is 6 already," according to one mom who met her on Thursday.
